attributes.action: ensure the same justice is metered out to MP's as is done to the common person and should seek prosecution of any MP who has claimed mortgage interest payments on mortgages already paid off.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's who have wrongfully claimed for mortgage interest on loans already paid off should be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. Ignorance of a crime is not a defence in the British justice system. No MP should have any priviledge or protection in this matter.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way. Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
